Class Ability

java.lang.Object
  Ability

public class Ability
extends java.lang.Object

An ability, such as spell or special attack.

Author:
George Shakhnazaryan

Field Summary
 int damage
          The base damage of the Ability.
 Buff deBuff
          The Buff is added to the target by the Ability.
 int energyCost
          The energy cost of using this Ability.
 int goldCost
          The cost to purchase the Ability in monetary units.
 boolean heal
          Whether of not this Ability is a heal.
 Buff helpfulBuff
          The Buff is added to the user by the Ability.
 java.lang.String id
          The unique ID of this Ability.
 int manaCost
          The mana cost of using this Ability.
 java.lang.String name
          The name of this Ability for the end user.
 boolean spell
          Whether or not this Ability is a spell.
 int temporaryBoostToCast
          This value is added to the user's ToCast to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryBoostToCrit
          This value is added to the user's ToCrit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryBoostToMeleeHit
          This value is added to the user's ToMeleeHit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryDamageToBlock
          This value is added to the target's ToBlock to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryDamageToDodge
          This value is added to the target's ToMeleeHit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryDamageToResist
          This value is added to the target's ToSave to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int temporaryDamageToSave
          This value is added to the target's ToDodge to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.
 int timeAfter
          The delay in using any other Abilities after the Ability is performed.
 int timeBefore
          The delay in time before the Ability is performed after it is selected.
 double weaponMultiplier
          The base damage of the weapon is multiplied by this value.
 int XPCost
          The experience necessary to use the Ability.

public int timeBefore
The delay in time before the Ability is performed after it is selected.

timeAfter

public int timeAfter
The delay in using any other Abilities after the Ability is performed.

spell

public boolean spell
Whether or not this Ability is a spell.

heal

public boolean heal
Whether of not this Ability is a heal.

weaponMultiplier

public double weaponMultiplier
The base damage of the weapon is multiplied by this value.

damage

public int damage
The base damage of the Ability. This is added to the multiplied weapon damage to calculate the damage of the Ability.

temporaryBoostToMeleeHit

public int temporaryBoostToMeleeHit
This value is added to the user's ToMeleeHit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

temporaryBoostToCast

public int temporaryBoostToCast
This value is added to the user's ToCast to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

temporaryBoostToCrit

public int temporaryBoostToCrit
This value is added to the user's ToCrit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

helpfulBuff

public Buff helpfulBuff
The Buff is added to the user by the Ability.

temporaryDamageToBlock

public int temporaryDamageToBlock
This value is added to the target's ToBlock to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

temporaryDamageToDodge

public int temporaryDamageToDodge
This value is added to the target's ToMeleeHit to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

temporaryDamageToSave

public int temporaryDamageToSave
This value is added to the target's ToDodge to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

temporaryDamageToResist

public int temporaryDamageToResist
This value is added to the target's ToSave to calculate the attack for the use of this Ability only.

deBuff

public Buff deBuff
The Buff is added to the target by the Ability.

XPCost

public int XPCost
The experience necessary to use the Ability.

public int goldCost
The cost to purchase the Ability in monetary units.
